name: Option Debit Spread Test
description: Test case for placing a debit spread order through agent interaction

parts.text: Create a debit spread by buying the Nvidia $900 call and selling the $950 call, both expiring next Friday, for 2 contracts at $15.00 net debit.
I need the specific option instrument IDs for both legs of the debit spread. Can you provide the instrument IDs for the NVDA $900 call and $950 call options expiring next Friday?
